pros: This bed skirt is 40% rayon derived from bamboo and 60% microfiber, and its pleated style looks great
The fabric is softer and thicker than most polyester bed skirts
Comes in seven color options and has a 15-inch drop
cons: This bed skirt may need to be ironed to eliminate wrinkles

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal. The center fabric that goes under the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am thankful for the reviews that came before me. I was looking for an inexpensive bed skirt, but not a cheap one. This is a great deal. The center fabric that goes under the mattress is actually good fabric! Not the flimsy stuff on other inexpensive bedskirts. It was obviously wrinkled when it came out of the package so I ironed in on low heat even though the label say NO IRON. It was fine. The fabric is thick enough to not be see through. There are pleats (not open corners) on the corners. Over all I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent. A bit polyester-y but that works to its ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a LOT of reviews before settling on this bed skirt for my king size bed. I have white bedding with a navy stripe and a headboard to match. I'd call the color a true navy, not quite as dark as a nautical navy but not as light as a true blue. The quality is excellent. A bit polyester-y but that works to its advantage as far as drape goes and doesn't hurt it since you'll never be touching it. It hangs beautifully and is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not Full sized as advertised. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit my full size box spring. I'm really upset. I cannot return it because I never got around to putting it on until today so it's past my return period. It's about 6 inches short of a full size box spring. When I buy a full sized item I expect it to be full size!! This is unacceptable. The material is thin and flimsy too. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: anteres

customer_reviews.title: Cream colored skirt too thin to hide box spring
customer_reviews.text: I don’t believe this bedskirt will ever look as good as it is shown in the photo. The material is extremely thin, in fact the cream colored fabric is not Completely opaque and the patterns on my boxspring can easily be seen through the skirt. The fabric is just too thin, like a very light T-shirt fabric.
customer_reviews.author: clubdoc

customer_reviews.title: Moldy!
customer_reviews.text: Package looked a little dirty. When I opened it the item smelled awful. Unfolding it revealed tons of mold! Disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Littlemamastina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago for my queen size bed. It looks nice but was really hard to have it stay the way I wanted on my amazon basics foldable metal bed frame. As I tried to put my mattress on top of it, the bed skirt would slip all around. If you have bed risers like I do, this will not be long enough touch the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Soft and true color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the softest ever, color is true and fits perfectly. I did give it a 3 because it was horribly wrinkled when it arrived and took 2 ironings to straighten out. To be fair, I guess getting it wrinkle free is impossible. Mow my hubby stores things under the bed and I do have to say it is wrinkle free. So soft, hubby insists trying bamboo sheets
customer_reviews.author: Margie T.

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this bedskirt is that it is all fabric
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this bedskirt is that it is all fabric. Some inexpensive skirts have cheap meshlike fabric on the body that the skirt attaches to. The cheaper styles tend to tear when you tug the skirt to straighten- not this wonderful skirt! This hangs beautifully! I’m super happy with this skirt!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Church

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is sloppy not stiff
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading. The fabric appears to be stiff and canvas like. Not the case. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mom forever

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed skirt - The material it is made from is very well made, I also like the fact that it comes in so many different colors! The skirt itself is very soft as well as looking quite nice on our bed. The quality is excellent. I will be buying a few more of these for our other bedrooms. I highly recommend this bed skirt - The price is great and it seems to be very well crafted!
customer_reviews.author: agunter

customer_reviews.title: scam product...not as described at all
customer_reviews.text: Product is NOT as described a total SCAM! I received a disgusting bright white satin bed skirt that was supposed to be a California king size but it fit like a queen and hung 2 inches off the ground (I measured my bed before purchasing and it should have fit perfectly). It was sewn crooked and the seams came ripped. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Adelle

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured/advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft....but who cares?! you're not sleeping with it. You need it to lay flat, not wrinkle and hold its shape none of which this does. It is flimsy, very wrinkled and does NOT have the straight edge to it as pictured in the advertisement. I will have to iron the damn thing to see if I can get it to lay straight but even if I do that it has sewn in pleats (ruffled sewn seams) that I did not want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is perfect, not flimsy at all and well put together. Some other reviewers said it was wrinkled. Of course it is wrinkled when you first take it out of the package, but I just sprayed some downy wrinkle release on it and it was perfect. Great soft material. Nice white color.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne DiMirra

customer_reviews.title: I like It.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed skirt. It was made much better than one I previously purchased (and returned) as it wasn't even sewn together properly. This bed skirt also is made with much better materials. It went on without a problem and looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: S. O'Day

customer_reviews.title: Quality bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that the middle section that the mattress is laid on is an actual fabric. I was expecting a cheap batting, with a loose fiber network rather than a woven textile. I'm sorry if there is a better word for it, I only know what it is called in furniture upholstery (batting or dust cover).
customer_reviews.author: Sophia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it was very wrinkled when it came out of packaging (it’s packed very tight). I washed it on gentle cycle and cool ironed it (even though it advises against it) and it came out completely fine. It does not have split ends, which is perfect for our bed without a fancy frame. It is nice and long and looks great! Thick enough to cover up the black-colored boxes we store under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shananagrams

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bed skirt, especially at this price. I've bought several bed skirts over the years and usually the material that goes under the mattress is very flimsy. This skirt is quality material throughout and packaging wrinkles ironed out easily (not like some I've seen that would NEVER come out). Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice dark chocolate brown color is exactly what I wanted. Was packed tightly so arrived wrinkled. Ran thru cold water rinse and light dryer turned out great. They are very lightweight, not transparent, and soft. Hang perfectly. For this price I couldn’t be happier. I saw reviews that said they arrived wrinkled and instructions say not to iron. Not true. It says ironing not required. And, it wasn’t for me, but you can definitely iron or steam.
customer_reviews.author: Jann H.

customer_reviews.title: Color is as pictured. The quality is less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is as pictured. The quality is less than what I expected, but it is my first bamboo purchase. The material is a bit stiff, so it doesn't hang as well as freely as a softer material.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara F.

customer_reviews.title: It's very soft not stiff
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is difficult to keep in place because it is very soft. The care label says do not iron but if you don't it looks horrible because it's very wrinkled. The fabric is very nice and soft which should actually be stiffer/ thickest so or sloped better. It doesn't show well unless you iron it. I would prefer a stiffer/ thicker fabric. But for $12 bucks you can't complain much.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was 100% black
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of how the corners folded and i wish they made the part that is covered by your mattress black also, because no matter how i position my mattress, i can see a bit of the white color underneath the mattress and it sticks out a lot because everything else is black.
customer_reviews.author: Jkell

customer_reviews.title: Thin and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It came extremely wrinkled and the only option I had was to iron it . It seems to be cheaply made. I am not overly thrilled with it, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled Mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was an absolute mess upon receipt- completely wrinkled and looked like someone had already returned it. There was also a black spot too, so my husband suggested washing and drying it per the directions to see if it would fix it. Took it out of the dryer and it still was an absolute wrinkled mess. I went for the more expensive option in hopes of no/minimal wrinkles but this product was absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sterrett

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I ordered this bed skirt because I believed it would fit my king-box spring perfectly. It does not. It hangs over the edge (white lining) and I don't want to go to the trouble of figuring out how to clamp it down to avoid this from happening. Just want everyone to know if you have a king size bed, this does not have a proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: What I want

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with footboard
customer_reviews.text: There are no slits in the corners of this bed skirt so it will not work if you have a bed frame with a footboard. Unfortunately I washed mine before I noticed this. If you don’t have a footboard, it seems like a decent bed skirt. It washed & dried fine. The White seems thick enough so that it’s not see through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: It’s not quite as shown in the picture but I read the reviews. It is not as crisp/thick looking. It came very wrinkled but a iron did wonders with the pleats. You cannot see through it and overall happy with it, and a great price. I was willing to spend more but this one had better reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ccc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed skirt!! Fits perfectly and the color is right on!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke w.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit thin was easy to put on bed after removing the mattress. I tuck my sheets and the bed skirt gets in the way while tucking. It will do the job until I can find one not quite so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great simple bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed skirt for the money. It was wrinkled of course from the packaging but I used a handheld steamer after putting it on the bed and the wrinkles came out very easily. The white is a bit sheer- I bought a cheap white fitted sheet to put over my dark navy box springs, and now it’s great. Perfect length and I like that the corners are pleated instead of split. No constant adjusting to hide the bed frame at the corners
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle free. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I got my bed skirt today and I absolutely love it! The beautiful blue color matches my bed perfectly and as soon as we put it on and smooth it down a little bit the wrinkles came right out. It fits my bed great and doesn't seem to slide around. It was an awesome purchase for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: AmyNickle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but pictures are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the quality of this is way better than anything I got at target or bed bath beyond at any price. However the color shown in the picture is nowhere near as dark as the color that arrive in the package so it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: DeskJobJogger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great && a perfect fit!! They are definitely made true to the size!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this bed skirt turned out. I received it today & so we went ahead & made the bed with it on it & it turned out perfect. The queen size was a exact fit for our queen size bed. I love the way it's made especially at the corners. I am so happy we went with this exact one.
customer_reviews.author: Kodii Koss

customer_reviews.title: Bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and everything the description stated. Went great with my bedding theme. Also, it covers what it is expected without dragging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jo Hart

customer_reviews.title: The material is super soft and thick
customer_reviews.text: The material is super soft and thick. I have had no problems with material ripping and have washed it once so far. My fault for buying the wrong size, so it does not fit as it should, but overall it works for what it is made to do. I will be buying another for my sons bed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit perfect, more durable than most of the bed skirts I've had in the past. I also love that it isn't a lint/fur magnet like the ones I've had in the past; it's def a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is perfect for my bed and frame. It doesn't sweep the floor. Feels extremely soft. Looks great. Came in a plastic package, doesn't have a weird odor. Might order another color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and put this bed skirt on my bed, only because I haven't had a chance to find a nicer one. It's real thin and see-through. Not crisp. Kind of saggy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been nicer
customer_reviews.text: Ok so mine is not all black. It has a thin cheap white layer and then the black edges. It doesn't want to unwrinkle even after a vigorous brushing and stint in the drier
customer_reviews.author: CorvetteLuci

customer_reviews.title: This is just okay
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is not anything special. It does cover under the bed; however, all pet hair clings to this fabric and it makes it look dirty. I have to lint roll it constantly. Would not recommend this if you have a pet with dark hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric for the price
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our bed skirt. The fabric on this does not wrinkle like our previous ones. It actually slipped between the mattress and box spring fairly easily and only required one person on a California king to put it in place. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sbry

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fabric!
customer_reviews.text: The brown color was a perfect match for my coverlet, and the feel of the fabric is beautiful. I haven't washed it yet, but did press it when it came out of the package and it was so easy to press out the few wrinkles. I would definitely order this again, and have no qualms about recommending it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Brust

customer_reviews.title: it was shorter than full queen size. You can ...
customer_reviews.text: it was shorter than full queen size. You can actually see the top of my mattress foundation because it's slightly too short. material seems cheap. Also, the stitching was not straight. Company clearly does not have quality control. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesn’t know where her scratch post went!
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes to scratch the bed so this did wonders for the look of our bedroom! Love it thanks! I added a pic of her wondering where her scratch post went! Lol did not iron it, some slight wrinkles, but I think if I steam it I’m sure it will take them right out
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: Not completely happy as I thought the bed skirt would be a little more structured, and thick with clean lines. This is still loose and flowy. Not what I wanted, but it still does the job of covering everything.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. I through it in the dryer to remove the packaging wrinkles which did not all fall out but good enough for me. I could have pulled out the iron. I love the pleats and the way this skirt falls. I am using it over a box spring on a Hollywood frame and it just touches the floor.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: ... and while the product is well made and looks nice, it taught me a valuable lesson
customer_reviews.text: This was the first bed skirt I've purchased as a single man (bought a few while married) and while the product is well made and looks nice, it taught me a valuable lesson. Bed skirts are more hassle than they're worth.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Riley

customer_reviews.title: Good Bed skirt, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, esp for the price. Ran it through the dryer to get the folded wrinkles out. Still a little wrinkly. About as thick as a sheet, but does adequate job covering the bottom mattress
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Worked out well with my bedroom set.
customer_reviews.text: This got delivered on time and was a great item to purchase for my bedroom. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J.Cicchitti

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber not enviromentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: Claimed was environmentally friendly but is a microfiber which ends up in the guts of the fish which we eat. Please DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very please
customer_reviews.text: The quality feels very good of course that arrived with wrinkles but I put it in the dryer with a damp washcloth in it freshened up perfectly very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dephif

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Cal King
customer_reviews.text: Washed and put this on our bed and I think it looks great. The pleat that’s in the middle is a little weird, but that’s my personal preference to have it be straight. Overall I’m happy with the purchase. It’s a good price for a California king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, but color is off
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and it is much nicer than the normal bedskirts at this price. The part that goes under your mattress is a white silky fabric (not the cheap stuff that tears easily). I ordered cream, and it is very yellow, so that is my only complaint. I thought it would be ivory color.....it's more yellow.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialKGirl

customer_reviews.title: Hide Your Shoes Behind the Wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and it serves it purchase. However it does not look like the picture, and likely never will. It arrived wrinkled and the material looks and feels a bit cheap. You can't see my shoes beneath the bed anymore... So it is functional. Next time I'll pay more and expect better
customer_reviews.author: DontPanic

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at A LOT of bed skirt trying to find an inexpensive, but nice looking option for our Airbnb. After reading the reviews I decided on this one and I have not been disappointed. It fits well, hangs nicely , I did press it before putting it on. It's been on over a month, through many guests and still looks great. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Evens

customer_reviews.title: great value and price
customer_reviews.text: arrived in less than 2 days, put on bed and it is perfect, the fit, the look. Tossed it in dryer for 10 minutes and all wrinkles came out. I am pleased, really finished the spare bedroom off.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: On My Bed Right Now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was never really a bed skirt type of person. The ones that I was introduced to before were frilly-like or just bland. This is such a good looking, yet simple addition to my bed.It is understated, but it works. It doesn't overpower the bed's aesthetic. For the price & quality, this was a nice surprise!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift but checked it out before wrapping. Although I can't say anything about the fit, I can say that the fabric looked lovely and felt like it would fall nicely when hanging. Great price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: GroveGranny

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice, and looks nice. I never ironed it and used it right out of the package (I was moving and had little time). It’s been a couple weeks and the wrinkles have faded, which is awesome news for me!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: It is very soft, but too soft for it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very soft, but too soft for it to hang the way I want it to. If I hadn't put the packaging in the trash I would return it. Also, it is slightly longer than the quoted 15" drop so it lays on the floor rather than hanging the way a bed skirt should. It seems very flimsy and is rather opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this bed skirt! the quality of the bed skirt is really good and it fits my bed perfectly. The material was great, I like the feeling it feels really soft. Definitely was worth it, really nice colors it looks great on my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: This product is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is wrinkle free, soft and does exactly as advertised. It is a great skirt for any bed and it fits all kinds of beds.
customer_reviews.author: J01ames

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Black box spring doesn't show.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our bed. We have a black box spring and it doesn't show through at all. Hangs nicely too. It's actually a 15" drop, not 14" as described. That cost a star but it worked out fine for us. It also says not to iron but just using the dryer to get the wrinkles out didn't work so we used a cool iron and it did fine.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: It fix perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something nice for my bed.Then I came across this,I have never been a fan of bed skirt but I decided to give it a try.I like the way I have transformed my bed,it fit perfectly and thicker than I had thought
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love that the part under the mattress is the same material as the skirt itself. It hangs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, don’t need anything too fancy and this gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Well made -Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material in both the skirt and the centerpiece. Reasonable weight in both. The navy blue is a shade lighter than true a Navy, though still a nice dark blue. Worked well for my setting but might disappoint some. Did not shrink or fade when washed and dried.
customer_reviews.author: cdo5

customer_reviews.title: It could be larger.
customer_reviews.text: This dust ruffle is nice. Looks good on my bed
customer_reviews.author: peggy stevenson

customer_reviews.title: It works and I’m sure it would be nice if I ironed it!
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt was definitely not wrinkle free and it’s still not wrinkle free (I’ve had it on my bed since I got it!) I bought the California king size and it fits a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.  Kind of cheapy
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting better quality and thicker bed skirt (more of the stiffer kind). This is thin and easily wrinkles so I’m a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, fits well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Zen Bamboo Ultra Soft Bed Skirt is very soft, fits the bed well and looks nice. I purchased one Full Size and one Queen Size and they were a good value buy for my 2 guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Good bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is soft and fits well on the bed. Attractive and doesn’t wrinkle easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is great. The color is nice and dark and matches ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is great. The color is nice and dark and matches the headboard I was trying to match. It wrinkles a bit but what doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: AeKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, came a bit wrinkled but nothing a couple days of use won’t straighten out. For the price definitely worth it, and it shipped incredibly fast!!
customer_reviews.author: obiajulu

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The fabric was thinner than I thought it would be, but overall met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: mamallama

customer_reviews.title: Drapes well
customer_reviews.text: The rayon blend material has nice body and drapes well. I ironed it and put it on the bed and it looks great. The navy color is a nice rich color. An advantage of rayon is that it takes color well, so the other colors are probably nice, as well. The deck is white polyester fabric and seems substantial enough to do the job just fine. I bought one and liked it and have purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material. I had to iron it before putting it on the foundation. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Flowly than straight
customer_reviews.text: It is an very pretty blue! It just the slit isn't really well done. It gets a little wrinkly. It is more flowly then straight.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: I needed bed skirts for twin beds & these are ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed bed skirts for twin beds & these are exactly what I expected. I tossed them into dryer & fluffed out packing wrinkles & put them right on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia McClatchey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice on the bed. Should not tear like my last two did.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M.

customer_reviews.title: Thin as paper
customer_reviews.text: We bought a white bedskirt and it was disappointing to see how thin the material was. We could see right through it to the bed frame. Perhaps it is better with a darker color. Overall we were disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome extra for your bed at a great price. It really makes a difference in the way your bed looks. It’s all in the details! The quality is great (I washed it before putting it on) especially for the money and the color is fab.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!! skirt tore when sliding mattress towards ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made!! skirt tore when sliding mattress towards the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alley Al

customer_reviews.title: Deep crisp white Bed Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crisp white color. I had to wash it and air fluff but still had wrinkles. I needed an inexpensive set to stage a bedroom to sell a home... for the price and quality it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: HotLanta

customer_reviews.title: The color was spot on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue and it was exactly like the color shown. It is soft and wrinkle free. It looks lovely with the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Klamm

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put on underneath the mattress
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our guest bedroom to cover a metal bed frame. It's easy to put on underneath the mattress, feels like a nice quality material, stays pretty wrinkle free and looks sharp. Can't ask much more from such a reasonably priced bed skirt!
customer_reviews.author: EVSHK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bed skirt! Exactly the correct length, made of nice material and looks great on the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Ironed beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, it comes folded in a small package. I checked the tag to see if you could iron, and even though it said not to, I put iron on low synthetic setting and wrinkles came out beautifully. The drop is perfect and it fits perfectly on box spring!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality stiching
customer_reviews.text: It's already fraying right out of the package. Strings hanging off.
customer_reviews.author: John M. DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: Great bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bed skirt. It adds the perfect touch of color with a navy headboard and white duvet. It arrived quickly and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it does looks like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: It really does fit well and after a fluff-up in the dryer, if virtually wrinkle free. Nice light weight fabric. Not transparent. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Trishe

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect right out of the package! I ordered the cal king size and it fits my mattress wonderful! Highly recommend (:
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on the mattress. Great vibrant blue color, thick quality fabric. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Here

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. It did require a quick iron to get the wrinkles out. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BRIDGET CONSTANTINE

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: All the positive comments people have made about this bed skirt are true. It is very soft and packing wrinkles easily ironed out. It drapes very nicely along the bed and is at a fantastic price. This is a win-win purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. GARDINER

customer_reviews.title: I Had Higher Hopes for this Bed Skirt
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this bed skirt. But, it doesn't fit well and is so very wrinkly out of the packaging. I will definitely have to steam it.
customer_reviews.author: SSG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price if it is packaged with moisture
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with what looked like raindrops inside the plastic packaging. I washed it but there are now stains left from whatever the moisture was. The outside packaging was completely dry & it did appear to ever been wet. Not sure what happened...
customer_reviews.author: Organic Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the bed skirt. It was a little wrinkly after taking it out of the package so I put it in my dryer on low for 15 minutes and that helped. The construction looks well made and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sheets
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the feel and size of the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Nelms

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt was much needed for our guest bedroom. Good quality at a reasonable price. Item arrived quickly, exactly as described. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Fabric in picture seems a lot thicker.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric seemed a little thin, but the overall look is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zen Bamboo Ultra Soft Bed Skirt - Premium, Eco-friendly, Hypoallergenic, and Wrinkle Resistant Rayon Derived From Bamboo Dust Ruffle with 15-inch Drop - Full - White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:FullThe Zen Bamboo Bed Skirt made from 40% rayon derived from bamboo and 60% brushed microfiber is a three-sided skirt designed for durability and style. This luxurious bed skirt is ideal for concealing items under the bed while also protecting against dust accumulation! This bed skirt stays wrinkle free with no ironing required. The wrinkle-free design is pleated and is a perfect addition to any bedding! Frustrated with buying colorful bedding only have to replace it due to fading and discoloration? This bed skirt is fade resistant and looks brand new for years to come! This bed skirt is machine washable for easy cleaning. Simply tumble dry with no ironing or expensive cleaning required!

Don’t wait order your Zen Bamboo Bed Skirt today!
feature_bullets: 40% Rayon Derived from Bamboo, 60% Brushed Microfiber

LUXURIOUS AND DURABLE - The Zen Bamboo Bed Skirt is a three-sided skirt made from 40% rayon derived from bamboo and 60% brushed microfiber. This luxurious bed skirt is the perfect finishing touch to your bed set. Plus, it is ideal for concealing items under the bed while also protecting against dust!
WRINKLE FREE - This bed skirt stays wrinkle free with no ironing required. The pleated design is a perfect addition to any bedding! Make your bedroom stand out with this luxurious dust ruffle!
FADE RESISTANT - Frustrated with buying colorful bedding only have to replace it due to fading and discoloration? This bed skirt is fade resistant and looks brand new for years to come!
EASY TO CLEAN - This bed skirt is machine washable for easy cleaning. Simply tumble dry with no ironing or expensive cleaning required!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.
